A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Way too much queso for my liking. Still overall satisfied with the final product. Just not what I had hoped it could have been. I viewed and defended the safeness of the plot in Episode 7: The Force Awakens as character setup up for a fast moving Episode 8 The Last Jedi and a darker Kylo Ren. While it was fresh had had some amazing scenes with the island and how the balance of the force works I was still left wanting more.
